name: Lawyers.com
description: The Lawyers.comSM Consumer Articles API offers access to Lawyers.comSM extensive library of legal articles to enhance your application or website providing a more robust experience for your site visitor. Lawyers.com content helps individuals better understand the law and make informed legal choices. These lawyer-written and reviewed articles are authoritative, yet easy to understand.
